listing.listing_description: Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact us.Villa de los Sueños delivers a uniquely enchanting experience of Los Cabos. Situated within minutes of Cabo San Lucas and Pedregal Beach, the villa enjoys lofty privacy and breathtaking views of the Sea of Cortez from its ample pool terrace, veranda, and interiors. The home's vintage colonial design evokes the charm and splendor of Old Mexico, while high-end amenities offer resort-worthy delights in total tranquility. Eight ocean-view bedrooms suites (including two in a separate guesthouse) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to sixteen in size. Your vacation rental at Villa de los Sueños includes daily housekeeping, a manager, and security.The outdoor living areas inspire memorable festivities or intimate delights under the Pacific sky. Soothe your bodies in the large spa and dip into the pool while gazing at the vast panorama. Rinse in the alfresco showers and bask in the Los Cabos sunlight. Sip delicious drinks at the poolside bar and gather for alfresco meals in the ocean breeze. Kindle the fire pit and outdoor hearth, admiring the sunset and stars from the cavernous veranda.The interiors evoke an exquisite antique ambiance, with dark wood ceiling beams, a stone fireplace, and original artwork adorning the luminous walls. The open-concept space features a comfortable living room, a superb bar, and a dining table for ten. The kitchen fuses artisanal detail with high-end appliances for the contemporary chef. Enjoy movies or billiard games at night, and start the morning with a workout in the gym.The bedrooms offer well-appointed havens for peaceful nights and low-key siesta hours. The main house features six bedroom suites—five with king beds, one with a queen bed—while the guesthouse includes two queen bedrooms. All eight bedrooms open to balconies or terraces and enjoy dreamy ocean views, high-end entertainment equipment, and ensuite bathrooms.Beyond Villa de los Sueños, you're perfectly positioned to enjoy the diverse riches of Baja Sur. Experience the epic nightlife of Cabo San Lucas, visit renowned Medano Beach and the iconic Land's End rock formation, and enjoy the world-class spas, golf courses, and watersport destinations lining the Los Cabos Corridor.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Look out over the white sands of Babalua Beach, the protected shores and cays of Princess Alexandra National Park and the turquoise waters over the barrier reef from Beach Enclave Beachfront Villa 1 - 5 Bedroom. This luxury vacation rental has gorgeous views, pristine contemporary interiors and a location on the exclusive International Drive neighborhood cul-de-sac just minutes from Grace Bay. The five bedrooms let you enjoy the sunshine and scenery of Turks and Caicos with up to ten friends and family.Your holiday at Beachfront Villa 1 includes the services of a property manager, concierge and butler, as well as daily continental breakfast and Beach Enclave group yoga sessions. The villa has its own private oceanfront terrace with a variety of sunny and covered sitting and lounging areas around an infinity pool. The covered outdoor kitchen with barbecue and dining area invites lingering into the evening, as does the firepit.The villa’s sleek, contemporary interiors can be opened to the terrace with wide glass pocket doors, linking the indoor great room to the outdoor living areas and letting in the warm ocean breeze. Gather for a chat on the slipcovered white sofas in the sitting area, on the chic white leather seats at the dining table, or along the breakfast bar in the clean-lined, fully equipped kitchen.Each of the house’s five bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and ocean views. There are four with king beds, including two honeymoon-style suites with their own balconies and al-fresco showers, and one with two twin beds. Wall-to-wall windows, high ceilings and beach-inspired tones of tan and blue give the bedrooms a bright, comfortable vibe.You’ll hardly even need sandals to go from Beachfront Villa 1 down the limestone staircase to the beach. If you’d like to see more of the island’s famed white sands and turquoise water, make the short drive to Grace Bay Beach or Long Bay Beach. It’s also a quick journey to the shops and restaurants of Grace Bay, the fantastic natural scenery of Princess Alexandra National Park and the beautifully landscaped Provo Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located right on the oceanfront of Puerto Vallarta’s South Shore, Villa Bahia is a contemporary tropical retreat, perfect for family getaways, vacations with friends, and high-end corporate retreats. Bahia’s social open concept atmosphere is ideal for group gatherings. All five of the villa’s bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and scenic ocean views. In fact, ocean views are incredibly easy to find within Villa Bahia’s multi-level layout. Nearby, you’ll find shopping, golf, nightlife, and plenty of beachfront in Puerto Vallarta, and along Mexico’s South Shore.Combining sleek and stylish modern design with the stately character of Spanish colonial architecture gives Villa Bahia a unique atmosphere in its many ocean-facing areas. In the kitchen, you’ll love the vaulted ceilings, brown bricks, and the warm, Old-World atmosphere they evoke. The living room is decorated with plush designer furniture arranged around spacious sitting areas within the vast, open-concept interior. Large doorways lead to the balcony, making it easy for guests, ocean breeze, and natural sunlight to flow in and out.Villa Bahia’s ocean-view balcony was made for capturing incredible sunsets, alfresco dining, and rejuvenation. The saltwater swimming pool, hot tub, and outdoor living area are perfect for relaxing afternoons. At dinner, the balcony has an outdoor kitchen, wet bar, and a barbecue. The endless ocean view will provide a breathtaking background for your alfresco meals. You’ll also appreciate the daily maid service. A private cook will provide two meals a day. And, the villa comes with a houseman and night butler so you and your guests can focus on rest and relaxation.Just three miles from home, Los Muertos Beach awaits. One of Mexico’s most beloved beachfront areas, Los Muertos features pristine sand and calm, clear waters that are perfect for family swimming, water sports, fishing, and diving. You’ll also find hotel restaurants and bars lining the sandy shore. If you’re a golf aficionado, Vista Vallarta and Nayar golf courses are both within about twenty miles.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Please Note : All guests must decide on the same combination of two meals per day (breakfast & lunch, lunch & dinner or breakfast & dinner). Meals are served “family-style”, with all guests having the same starter, main course, side and dessert. Certain exceptions can be made for those with allergies, certain food intolerance and/or children (advanced notice may be required).

listing.listing_description: Immerse yourself in the charms of St. Martin at Magnolia. A sophisticated hideaway overlooking the Caribbean Sea, this luxury vacation rental perfectly captures the island’s mix of chic atmosphere and incredible natural scenery. Reserve all three bedrooms for a getaway with up to six friends and family members, or book a stay in one or two bedrooms for a quieter holiday or even a honeymoon.Take in the stunning views over the ocean to the neighboring island of Saba from the villa’s expansive private terrace. There are loungers in the shade and sunshine, a pool with a built-in bar area, covered sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and even an al-fresco mini-bar with a fridge. When the sun sets, flip on the provided mosquito trap and linger outdoors, or head inside to watch satellite TV or share photos via Wi-Fi.Linked to the terrace by wide sliding doors and topped by vaulted ceilings, the interiors of Magnolia are bright and modern. In the living and dining rooms, sleek furnishings create a contemporary vibe that’s given a beachy touch by wicker chairs and light fixtures. The fully equipped kitchen opens directly to the al-fresco dining area for a seamless indoor-outdoor experience.Each of the villa’s three bedrooms has a king bed and an en-suite bathroom with both indoor and outdoor showers. Two of the bedrooms are connected—the perfect setup for parents traveling with children but wanting their own space. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are stylish oases with their own vaulted ceilings, brightly hued accent walls and doors to the terrace.Magnolia’s location in the island’s Terres Basses - Hillside area is private, quiet and beautiful—think lush green hillsides sloping gently to an azure sea. But it’s also close to the white sands of Long Bay Beach, popular with celebrities, and Marigot, capital of the French side of the island. You’ll find plenty of restaurants within a 10-minute drive, but for a unique experience, make the 20-minute trip to Grand Case, known as the culinary capital of the Caribbean.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
